To The Victims Go The Spoileds



APPEARANCES
  • No upcoming events.
January 17th, 2011

Norrin bought Dragon Age: Origins about a month ago during the Steam sale, and also got Recettear to tide him over until it finished its sixteen-hour download. He played the latter for more a week before even remembering Dragon Age existed, so I guess it must be a good game or something. This is a comic about that game.
Recettear: an Item Shop's Tale
